text: Ramon Fernandez, currently delegate CEO, would become Executive Director Finance, Performance and Development. Gervais Pellissier, Delegate CEO, would become Executive Director for Human Resources and Group Transformation, while Mari-Nolle Jgo-Laveissire will oversee operations in Europe, outside of France.The months ahead include some uncertainties but also real opportunities, whether that means accelerating digital transformation, making further technological progress (5G, network function virtualisation, cloud, edge) or taking advantage of developments specific to our telecoms sector, said Orange Chairman and CEO Stephane Richard in a statement.
